bill.title: Elections; False Voter Information; Penalties
bill.description: Removes the cap on the fine for providing false information in a signed affidavit in an application for voter registration during the late registration period or at an absentee polling place to make the maximum fine consistent with the maximum fine for a class C felony. Takes effect on 1/7/2059. (SD1)
